snippet: Pervez Musharraf, who faces an array of criminal charges, can now travel freely within the country after six months of house arrest.
abstract: Pervez Musharraf, Pakistan's former military ruler, is freed on bail after six months under house arrest.
lead_paragraph: Pervez Musharraf, who faces an array of criminal charges, can now travel freely within the country after six months of house arrest.

headline.main: Ex-Leader Of Pakistan Is Released On Bail
